elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} []The next card you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.  When I go to Reserve from your hand — []You may play me for free and I gain [[Asleep]].
{J} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If it's a Permanent: [Sabotage].  When I go to Reserve from the Expedition zone — []You may play me for free and I gain [[Asleep]].
{H} []Draw a card.  When I go to Reserve from your hand — []You may play me for free and I gain [[Asleep]].
When I go to Reserve from the Expedition zone — []You may play me for free and I gain [[Asleep]].  When another Robot joins your Expeditions — []I gain 2 boosts.
